        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: QueryFactory
        Creates and returns a Query for the given arguments. The last argument is optional and may be null.
        Specified by:
        createQuery in interface QueryFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the result

      • createQuery

        public <T> Query<T> createQuery​(Datastore datastore,
                                String collection,
                                Class<T> type)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: QueryFactory
        Creates and returns a Query for the given arguments. Default implementations of this method will simply delegate to QueryFactory.createQuery(Datastore, Class) with the last argument being null.
        Specified by:
        createQuery in interface QueryFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the result
        Parameters:
        datastore - the Datastore to use
        collection - the actual collection to query. This overrides any mapped on collection on type.
        type - the type of the result
        Returns:
        the query
        See Also:
        QueryFactory.createQuery(Datastore, Class)
